title: If They Can't Find Any Radicals, Theyâ€™ll Create Them | Guests: Vivek Ramaswamy & Steve Deace | 8/10/22
description:
Glenn goes through the Left's projection habit as former President Trump deals with another investigation. Vivek Ramaswamy, co-founder of Strive Asset Management, shares how conservatives can start putting their money where their mouth is by abandoning woke companies. Glenn asks the most burning questions regarding the FBI's raid on Donald Trump's home. Glenn and Stu evaluate a recent Washington Post article suggesting adopting a four-day work week to help the environment. BlazeTV host Steve Deace joins to preview his new book, "Rise of the Fourth Reich," urging Americans not to forget the fascistic policies under COVID. Blaze podcast host Daniel Horowitz, co-author of "Rise of the Fourth Reich," joins to discuss what Americans can learn from the new book.
